original_text: As soon as Gideon heard the telling of the dream and its interpretation, he worshiped. And he returned to the camp of Israel and said, “Arise, for the Lord has given the host of Midian into your hand.”
korean_text: 기드온이 그 꿈과 해몽하는 말을 듣고 경배하며 이스라엘 진영으로 돌아와 이르되 일어나라 여호와께서 미디안과 그 모든 진영을 너희 손에 넘겨 주셨느니라 하고

sentences.original_text: As soon as Gideon heard the telling of the dream and its interpretation
sentences.korean_translation: 기드온이 꿈 이야기와 그 해석을 듣자마자

sentences.original_text: And he returned to the camp of Israel and said,
for the Lord has given the host of Midian into your hand.”
sentences.korean_translation: 주께서 미디안 군대를 너희 손에 넘겨주셨습니다.”
